name: Timaeus
description:
Comes with 2 Transmutation Materials when played.
End Phase: Gain 1 Transmutation Material.
When playing an Artifact Card from your hand: If possible, spend Transmutation Materials equal to the total cost of the Artifact and equip this Artifact for free. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: Comes with 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Transmutation Materials</color> when played.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Transmutation Material</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When playing an {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact Card from your hand:</color> If possible, spend <color=#FFFFFFFF>Transmutation Materials</color> equal to the total cost of the {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact and equip this {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact for free. (Once per Round)

(Once per Round)
storytext: "Hello there... Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."
source: Reward for accepting Timaeus' Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
